titleStmt.title: By the Lords Justices, a proclamation ... whereas this present Parliament stands prorogued to the twenty ninth day of this instant November ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lords Justices.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Other title information taken from first three lines of text.
"Given at the court at Whitehall, the third day of November, 1698. In the tenth year of His Majesties reign."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
